data.title: Globalization and The Future of Labour Law (John D. R. Craig, S. Michael Lynk (Editors) ) (Z-Library)
data.meta_description: Globalization and the Future of Labour Law (John D. R. Craig, S. Michael Lynk (Editors)) (Z-Library) - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. How are national and international labour laws responding to the challenge of globalization as it re-shapes the workplaces of the world? This collection of essays by leading legal scholars and lawyers from Europe and the Americas was first published in 2006. It addresses the implications of globalization for the legal regulation of the workplace.
data.text: Globalization and The Future of Labour Law (John D. R. Craig, S. Michael Lynk (Editors) ) (Z-Library)
